name: Mission Demolition (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player must hit the green area of the castle with the ball to advance to the next level. To do this, he uses a slingshot.
  • The game is controlled by the gaming mouse. The player pulls a slingshot to launch balls.
  • The game has 4 levels.
  • The player can switch between: castle, long shot, slingshot.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Mission-Demolition

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
